Hello to everyone. There is a closed air in Istanbul today. I'm at home with my computer.
I visited last Thursday - Friday, Bolu and Düzce. Both cities are well known, but I have not visited for a long time.
Bolu is a city full of wonderful natural beauties. Abant in particular, many lakes like the Seven Lakes, Sunnah Lake ...
National parks, highlands, ski resorts ...
Normally, blue and green always meet at sea level. But in Bolu, blue and green met at 1000 meters above this lake and forests.
The wonderful beauties of this place are almost hidden ... We need to introduce these to Turkey and the world.
Here is one of them on the edge of the frozen lake in Gölcük. I made a nice chat in the villages in the background with my friends. Http://t.co/mQw6xmDo
I am very sorry for the many provincial governorates that I visited. The old governor's mansions are gone, with a flat ceiling ...
... there are buildings without aesthetic and symmetry.
I was very happy to see Bolu Governor's Residence. A beautifully preserved, historic building built in the early 1800s, http://t.co/hKf9zJYv
Just like in every city, our citizens showed love and sympathy in Bolu and Düzce. I thank you all very much.
He gave this basket of apples he brought from his aunt garden in Bolu. http://t.co/8i8aex7h
There was a life for Mrs. Hayrunnisa with the Sepette apples.
I carried the Friday prayer in the Cedidiye Camis in Düzce. Then we embraced our people in the square in front of the window http://t.co/HDjLjtcy
Düzce, 1999 The wounds caused by the epidemic have started to spiral. I was very pleased to see that it was done in a planned way.
That's it for today. I wish everyone a good weekend.

Today we present the ProPyme Seal that accredits companies that comply with paying their suppliers within a period of no more than 30 days.
Stamp ProPyme facilitates the access of SMEs to working capital for its development. We congratulate the companies that obtained this seal.
